title: Tung Chung Chai Gathering
description: Looking for some 'out of home bonding time' with your mother? Come join us for this fun session where we will paint, share and have tea and snacks together.

title: DIY Mirror Clay Art
description: Get creative with your child by designing unique clay decorations for mirrors. A fun and artistic way to bond and express creativity.

title: Mother-Daughter Bonding Time
description: Lets cherish special moments with engaging activities that strengthen the mother-daughter relationship. Perfect for creating lasting memories.

title: Family Plant-A-Tree
description: Join forces with your family to plant a tree and contribute to the environment. A rewarding activity that teaches sustainability and teamwork.

title: Family Movie Night
description: Gather your loved ones, choose a favorite film, and enjoy a cozy movie night. Don't forget the popcorn!

title: Family Karaoke Night
description: Sing your heart out with family and enjoy an evening of laughter and music. Perfect for discovering hidden talents and having fun together.

title: Picnic Bliss - Savor the Afternoon
description: Pack a basket with your favorite snacks and head to a park for a relaxing afternoon picnic. Enjoy nature and quality family time outdoors.
